question: If I won the lottery, I _____ a big house.
If it rained tomorrow, I _____ my umbrella.
If I had more time, I _____ a new hobby.
If you were hungry, I _____ you something to eat.
If I found a magic lamp, I _____ three wishes.
If I had a million dollars, I _____ a trip around the world.
If it snowed today, I _____ snowball fights.
If I could fly, I _____ to the moon.
If I won the race, I _____ a gold medal.
If I had a time machine, I _____ to the future.
